scripts.start-prod: . $HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && mkdirp server/logs && mkdirp server/db && npm run forever-stopall && forever start -o server/logs/forever-`date '+%Y%m%d%H%M%S'`.log server/server.js
scripts.deploy-prod: . $HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && npm run stop-prod & sudo git pull && npm install && npm run start-prod
